channel.title: Experience on Your Name — IT Security Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Experience on Your Name — IT Security Engineer

item.title: 0651 — Data Network Specialist
item.description: Supported base-wide classified and unclassified networks for 3,000+ users with network administration, troubleshooting, and cybersecurity enforcement in mission-critical environments.

item.title: Cloud Architect
item.description: Led secure cloud architecture and the initial transition to Azure Government IL5/IL6 for USCENTCOM, delivering IaC frameworks, DevSecOps platforms, and data analytics foundations aligned to DoD governance.

item.title: Innovations Engineer, Cloud & Modernization
item.description: Advised CENTCOM J6 on emerging technologies and modernization strategies, ensuring secure and interoperable adoption across cloud, cyber, and network domains.

item.title: Network Operations SME, Senior
item.description: Lead network engineer supporting 17 Air Force bases, delivering Tier 2/3 support, routing/switching engineering, identity services, and data center operations for 10,000+ users.

item.title: Network Operations Technician
item.description: Provided Tier 0–2 operational support for enterprise network services, DNS, firewalls, and Cisco routing/switching across Air Force installations.

item.title: Senior Cloud Cyber Security Engineer — Lead
item.description: Lead cybersecurity engineer for the Cloud One Common Computing Environment, supporting RMF, vulnerability management, ATO sustainment, and DevSecOps security integration across hybrid DoD cloud workloads.

item.title: Senior Cyber Infrastructure Analyst
item.description: Senior engineer responsible for boundary cybersecurity infrastructure, CND support, and cyber range development to strengthen defensive posture for USCENTCOM HQ and theater networks.
